name: Molten Knight
desc: Every time the team obtains 9 stack(s) of Critical Boost or defeats the enemy target, fires 10 Lux Arrow(s) to strike random targets. Each Lux Arrow deals Wind DMG equal to 400% base DMG and applies 1 Spore to the attacked target, while also dealing 1 hit of Spore burst DMG. During this time, max Spore stacks will become 99.
